snippet: Sites like Reddit and 4chan have become a sort of proving ground, where an extreme, Internet-amped version of Donald Trump’s message is shared and refined.
abstract: Donald Trump's sharing of video created by anonymous user of website Reddit on his official Twitter account is example of how Trump has relied on social media platforms to spread his message, rather than on organized online operation; Trump's supporters on Reddit are very active and draw significant attention.
lead_paragraph: Sites like Reddit and 4chan have become a sort of proving ground, where an extreme, Internet-amped version of Donald Trump’s message is shared and refined.

headline.main: Donald Trump Finds Support in Reddit’s Unruly Corners
headline.print_headline: Donald Trump Finds Support in the Web’s Unruly Corners
